page.title: 08 LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Most of the outdoor recreation tends to be for individuals rather than teams. There is ample opportunity for fishing. The River Teme provides some of the best trout-fishing in Wales. Horse-riding is quite popular and the Teme Valley Hunt meets in the area numerous times during the hunting season.There is plenty of opportunity for shooting game. Beguildy School Swimming Pool is used a lot in warm weather. Several boys take part in motorcycle scrambling competitions. The only team sport based in the survey area is tug o' war. Felindre Tug o' War team has built an excellent record for itself since it was formed in 1970. The team has won the Welsh Tug o' War Championships many times including this year and has represented Wales in the 640 and 560kg weight in many parts of the world.
